title: IPartingLineFeatureData.IGetPartingLines
description: Gets the edges used as parting lines.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of edges used as parting lines

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of edges used as parting lines of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
IPartingLineFeatureData::GetPartingLinesCount
before calling this method.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
